fr.upmc.components.connectors

Class AbstractTwoWayConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.upmc.components.connectors.AbstractConnector
      • fr.upmc.components.connectors.AbstractTwoWayConnector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConnectorI, TwoWayConnectorI, ComponentImplementedI, OfferedI, RequiredI, TwoWayI, java.rmi.Remote
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractDataTwoWayConnector, PairedGaugeConnector

    public abstract class AbstractTwoWayConnector
extends AbstractConnector
implements TwoWayConnectorI
    The class AbstractTwoWayConnector partially implements a basic connector between components calling each others services in a peer to peer way rather than in a client-provider relationship.

    Description

    Invariant

     invariant      true

    Created on : 2012-01-24

    Version:
    $Name$ -- $Revision$ -- $Date$
    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant
